Thank you for electing me as your Member of Parliament
Thank you for visiting my website.
This website is in the process of being revamped to provide much more information on my work for you. In the meantime, you can follow me on Facebook or Instagram for more regular updates â€“ or read my weekly column in the Worthing Herald.
I can also only deal with issues raised by people living within the East Worthing and Shoreham constituency.
Please send any correspondence to tom.rutland.mp@parliament.uk, including your name, contact details and home address, so that I know you are a resident within East Worthing and Shoreham.
Urgent casework from constituents are always prioritised, which means that other queries, including policy queries, will take longer to respond to.
Best wishes,
Tom Rutland MP
